description: Beautiful hike from Noyse Lake to the Parking Area.Timing is with 5 year old daughter.We enjoy the Cabin at Noyse lake (bookings available to Kludahk outdoors club members).
directions: Access the parking area by heading past the town of Sooke and Sombrio Provincial Park. Take a right on Jack Elliott main (turns into W111). Follow the logging road until you enter a clearing with a fire pit in the middle.If you purchase the backroads map book it is helpful with the logging roads.
title: Kludahk Trail, Noise Lake to Elliott main
